SUB_TITLE.ROOMS: Cozy yet refined rooms, tucked deep inside Germany's mystical Black Forest. Wake up to the soft glow of morning mist drifting through the pines, breathe in the crisp forest air, and listen to nothing but the sound of nature around you. Each of our eight boutique rooms is designed to feel like your own private hideaway—warm, elegant, and perfectly secluded. Spend your days wandering through ancient woodland trails, relaxing by the fire, or simply enjoying the peaceful silence from your balcony. At night, unwind in the comfort of your room as the forest grows quiet and the stars appear above the treetops.
ABOUT: Paradise Hotel is a secluded {count} rooms luxury retreat hidden deep inside the Emerald Grove Valley, a fictional location inspired by Germany's mystical Black Forest. Surrounded by towering pine trees, morning mist, and untouched nature, the hotel offers an intimate sanctuary where guests disconnect from the world and reconnect with themselves.

The architecture blends natural stone, warm wood, and large panoramic windows — creating harmony between modern luxury and the wild forest outside. With just eight exclusive rooms, Paradise Hotel ensures privacy, silence, and a truly personalized experience for every guest.
It is a place for couples, writers, nature lovers, and anyone seeking peace, fresh air, and forest magic.
STORY: Since 1974, nestled in the untouched beauty of the Emerald Grove Valley, Paradise Hotel was designed with one purpose — to create a peaceful sanctuary where guests can slow down, breathe, and reconnect with nature.

Surrounded by ancient pines and soft morning mist, the hotel offers only eight private rooms, each crafted to highlight the forest's natural charm. From panoramic glass windows to handcrafted wooden interiors, every detail reflects our commitment to comfort, sustainability, and authentic forest living.
Whether you're seeking a romantic escape, a creative retreat, or simply a quiet place to rest, Paradise Hotel promises an unforgettable experience in the heart of the Black Forest.

LIST_ITEM.TAGLINE: Luxury Forest Retreat – Emerald Grove Valley, Black Forest
LIST_ITEM.NO_BOOKINGS: You have no bookings yet. Check out our

ROOMS.DESC: Cozy yet refined rooms, tucked deep inside Germany's mystical Black Forest. Wake up to the soft glow of morning mist drifting through the pines, breathe in the crisp forest air, and listen to nothing but the sound of nature around you. Each of our eight boutique rooms is designed to feel like your own private hideaway—warm, elegant, and perfectly secluded. Spend your days wandering through ancient woodland trails, relaxing by the fire, or simply enjoying the peaceful silence from your balcony. At night, unwind in the comfort of your room as the forest grows quiet and the stars appear above the treetops.

DESC.TypeA: Designed for couples seeking peace and intimacy in nature’s embrace. Spacious suites with private balconies overlooking the pine forest. Features: king bed, fireplace, panoramic glass wall, rain shower. Enjoy the scent of pine trees and birdsong as you unwind in your personal sanctuary.
DESC.TypeB: Perfect for small families or close friends. This spacious room combines modern comfort with natural materials — wooden textures, soft lighting, and wide windows overlooking the forest. Includes a queen bed and a single bed, private terrace, and a luxurious rain shower.
DESC.TypeC: Ideal for groups or large families who love to stay together without sacrificing privacy. The lodge offers two separate bedrooms, a shared living area with a fireplace, and a fully equipped kitchenette. Large windows and a forest-view veranda make it easy to connect with nature at any hour.
DESC.TypeD: The crown jewel of Paradise Hotel — a luxurious forest villa for big families, groups, or retreats. Features five bedrooms, a private pool, outdoor jacuzzi, spacious lounge with panoramic glass walls, and a large terrace surrounded by trees. Perfect for celebrations, relaxation, and unforgettable moments in nature’s luxury.

FACILITY_DESC.FITNESS_CENTER: Stay active during your stay with our fully equipped fitness center, featuring modern cardio and strength training equipment.
FACILITY_DESC.SWIMMING_POOL: Enjoy a refreshing swim in our indoor pool surrounded by stunning views.
FACILITY_DESC.HOTEL_BAR: Relax and unwind at our stylish hotel bar, offering a wide selection of cocktails, wines, and spirits.
FACILITY_DESC.RESTAURANT: Savor gourmet meals made from locally sourced ingredients at our on-site restaurant.
FACILITY_DESC.LIBRARY: Curl up with a good book in our cozy library, featuring a curated selection of literature and comfortable seating.
FACILITY_DESC.KIDS_AREA: Keep the little ones entertained in our dedicated kids play area, filled with toys and games.
FACILITY_DESC.OUTDOOR_AREA: Explore our beautifully landscaped outdoor areas, perfect for leisurely walks and relaxation.
FACILITY_DESC.FIRE_PIT: Gather around the fire pit in the evenings for warmth and storytelling under the stars.
